channel.title: So I got muted
channel.description:
I got muted for Offensive/Inappropriate Language Major ICU (What ever the ICU means).
[code=Offence] Blame0bama : What's good range armour for 80 range Blame0bama : -searches- Blame0bama : Hahaha I typed in "Royal d" runescape wants the royal D Blame0bama : You know what's funny Blame0bama : Anything Blame0bama : ^ ************ : [clan] 70 range ^^ Blame0bama : My ******* level is 99. ************ : [clan] Lol not right now ^^ just doing slayer lol ************ : [clan] 71 Blame0bama : Don't say that ************ : [clan] ^^ Blame0bama : You remind me of a friend from school Blame0bama : And he's aloser. Blame0bama : A loser* Blame0bama : I'd rather accept a cheeseburger. Blame0bama : What's the name of the royal c'bow. Blame0bama : 20 levels away :P ************ : [clan] I dont know either sorry ************ : [clan] Well, for that i know, but i mean i dont know if you can do the one he asked X Blame0bama : You can't yolo in runescape Blame0bama : You have inf lives. Blame0bama : Sure I can Blame0bama : I blame him for this game costing an hours worth of work Blame0bama : At minimal wage. ************ : [clan] Sad :( ************ : [clan] What did they do to it? ************ : [clan] Sad :( ************ : [clan] ^^ ************ : [clan] Yes lol ************ : [clan] No, it's faster in your own house ************ : [clan] Lines? ^^ ************ : [clan] Wc Xd Blame0bama : Buying ***. Must be girl Blame0bama : I can't believe i got responces. Blame0bama : Buying weed. Must be purp. Blame0bama : Drugscape Blame0bama : Do it Blame0bama : Take that as a no ha Blame0bama : You need the entire set Blame0bama : Then while wearing Blame0bama : Right click it Blame0bama : :D Blame0bama : Talk fother muckers Blame0bama : Hue hue hue you did Blame0bama : I use them in... Dungeons Blame0bama : ;) Blame0bama : Selling bcp. One *******. Blame0bama : Lol [/code]
The ignored a lot of the chat, which isn't right because if they didn't, you'd see that we were all swearing and making jokes. Let alone I don't know what part got me muted.

item.title: So I got muted
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

This can be closed at anytime. my 3-day mute is well served.

Read full topic

item.title: So I got muted
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

That’s how Fagex works. Everyone else who curses that you report will never get muted, but when you say one damn sentence that someone doesn’t like it’s a 2 or 3 day ban. Makes no sense. Why they don’t just have the characters deleted if they don’t like it is beyond me.

Read full topic

item.title: So I got muted
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:31, topic:518489”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=636755.msg4293654#msg4293654 date=1367808476]
Yeah, there’s only 2 shown in my chat two. But the other person in the chat was a friend whom was also talking just as bad as I.
Plus, the issue with that rule is there’s a lot of stretching to it since they added the filter. Stretching that isn’t clear to players.
[/quote]
Filter or not, the rules still apply.[/quote]
When they released the filter, they talked about how the rule would be ‘modified’ because of it. But they didn’t add to what extent.

Also, I know my friend wasn’t muted because I talked to him in the clan chat after I had been muted.

Read full topic

item.title: So I got muted
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

amy_webb:

The conversation also would have made more sense had it been hid friend who reported him, and the conversation would have been recognisable. Mute reports only ever show two people from my experience, it has never shown more then both.

The only person that would have a reason to was the kid I pissed off. My friend maybe to be a dick, but he’d be muted too.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:27, topic:518489”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=636755.msg4293654#msg4293654 date=1367808476]
Yeah, there’s only 2 shown in my chat two. But the other person in the chat was a friend whom was also talking just as bad as I.
Plus, the issue with that rule is there’s a lot of stretching to it since they added the filter. Stretching that isn’t clear to players.
[/quote]
Maybe he reported you o.O. Just an assumption though.[/quote]
Wouldn’t the reporters chat be sent in along with the reportee’s? Thus getting him (assumed) in trouble.

Read full topic

item.title: So I got muted
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:24, topic:518489”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=636755.msg4293516#msg4293516 date=1367788544]

My point being that they didn’t show the entire chat. Everyone in that corner of the GE was talking the same way I was, so they all should have been muted too, am I right?

I’m sure they reviewed the entire chat log from every person around you. They aren’t going to tell you that other people were punished for their actions, because it really isn’t your business.

Wouldn’t all of the people talking show up in the evidence then?
Only 2 people did. Me, and a kid in a friend chat.

No, you two only showed up because you were reported and he reported you. You are only going to receive evidence for the reason you were banned, not evidence for why others were banned.
[/quote]
Muted*
But normally they show the entire chat.
And if that’s the case that they show only me, why did the person in my clan show up?[/quote]
I hope you understand that everything we have told you is a mere guess on the core workings of the system. No one besides Jagex employees truly understands what factors are taken into consideration, or to what extent. All we can tell you is that we know for a fact it shows evidence of YOU breaking a rule; however, I can say that I still have mutes from 2010, in which I only saw the people involved in the rule broken (me and the victim), although that person’s name was censored.

Read full topic

item.title: So I got muted
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:23, topic:518489”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=636755.msg4293440#msg4293440 date=1367776144]

My point being that they didn’t show the entire chat. Everyone in that corner of the GE was talking the same way I was, so they all should have been muted too, am I right?

I’m sure they reviewed the entire chat log from every person around you. They aren’t going to tell you that other people were punished for their actions, because it really isn’t your business.

Wouldn’t all of the people talking show up in the evidence then?
Only 2 people did. Me, and a kid in a friend chat.
[/quote]
No, you two only showed up because you were reported and he reported you. You are only going to receive evidence for the reason you were banned, not evidence for why others were banned.[/quote]
Muted*
But normally they show the entire chat.
And if that’s the case that they show only me, why did the person in my clan show up?

Read full topic

item.title: So I got muted
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Null Amount, post:18, topic:518489”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=636755.msg4293243#msg4293243 date=1367727008]
My point being that they didn’t show the entire chat. Everyone in that corner of the GE was talking the same way I was, so they all should have been muted too, am I right?
[/quote]
How do you know that they didn’t get muted too?[/quote]
I don’t. But from what I know of runescape’s report system. The chat only gets reviewed if a person is reported. I’m pretty sure I got reported by this kid because I wasn’t helping him recover from being hacked out of 50m (supposedly).

[quote=“tigerclan, post:17, topic:518489”]how the fuck did you say fuck?

edit: “fuck”

edit 2: what the fuck…[/quote]
Fixed it for you.

Read full topic

item.title: So I got muted
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“tigerclan, post:17, topic:518489”]how the love did you say love?

edit: “love”

edit 2: what the love…[/quote]
Pretty sure you put [b ][/b ] in the middle of the u and the c.

The point isn’t that they weren’t included, because they probably got muted too. They only show your chat and the chat of the person who reported you. They’re showing you where you went wrong, not where everyone in the community did.

Read full topic

item.title: So I got muted
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:9, topic:518489”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=636755.msg4293008#msg4293008 date=1367684785]

The whole think seems silly, despite the offensive language filter they have in game, i still don’t think you’re allowed to swear.

I’ve been told by p mods that you’re allowed to swear, as long as it isn’t directed towards other players.
Like I can say: “Fuck I died” but not: “You fucking asshole”

I see what you did there…

You also used a lot more words then profanity.

You know what’s surprising? I haven’t been forced to change my name.

I’m not, Jagex is english… They probably blame Obama too.

They have a lot of US players that’d get offended. My name starts debates, it’s funny.

It’s ok, the right to freedom of speech is in your constitution. Therefore, it cannot be changed.
[/quote]
If you put it that way, I should be able to swear all I want. Just saying.[/quote]
When you agree to the terms and conditions, you aren’t only agreeing to follow their rules, but you are accepting that if your actions don’t oblige to their rules, action can and will be taken against you, regardless if freedom of speech is a right granted from the Constitution.

Read full topic
